artist: Artist: Carolyn Trant; Author: Federico García Lorca; Translator: John K. Walsh; Translator: Francisco Aragón; Publisher: Parvenu Press, London, England
description: red hard-bound book; opening fastened with two red ribbons; contains hard-bound book with red spine and off-white cover with natural fibers and floral and vegetable motifs across top and bottom; interior has text juxtaposed with same organic motifs; bound volume; 47 leaves; lender's loan #170 and #60

markings: Numbered in pencil on colophon page: 18
medium: Color woodcuts on Nepalese Khadi paper; bound volume
provenance: William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2018.
signed: Signed in pencil on colophon page: Carolyn Trant
title: Sonnets of Dark Love
